text:
â€” Erick Brockway (@erickbrockway) March 22, 2017 ISIS buried hundreds of women & children in mass graves and there are still so many horrors to find because we barely tried to stop it

2017: Let me tell you of these great horrors with my twitter account

Maybe Power was preoccupied with Broadway musicals and has just had a chance to catch up on the news.
